comment._content: Mrs. Steven Beckwith Ayres (that spelling), leader of women supporters of the Democratic Party in New York City; her husband was a congressman: uic.edu/orgs/cwluherstory/jofreeman/polhistory/1912.htm Mrs. Linthicum is Helen A. Linthicum, wife of John Charles Linthicum, congressman from Baltimore: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Charles_Linthicum
